missionVision.mission: To inspire and empower students to innovate through technology, teamwork, and leadership.
missionVision.vision: To become a leading student branch recognized for its impact, inclusivity, and innovation.

whatWeDo.title: Events
whatWeDo.description: We organize impactful technical and non-technical events.

whatWeDo.title: Workshops
whatWeDo.description: Hands-on sessions to develop technical and soft skills.

whatWeDo.title: Competitions
whatWeDo.description: Hackathons, coding challenges, and innovation contests.

summary.title: About IEEE MET SB
summary.description: IEEE MET Student Branch is a vibrant community of passionate students who aim to promote technological innovation, leadership, and professional development. As part of the IEEE global network, our branch organizes events, workshops, and activities that empower students to learn, grow, and make an impact in engineering and technology. We also collaborate with different IEEE societies such as WiE (Women in Engineering), technical chapters, and regional initiatives.

highlights.heading: Innovation
highlights.text: Driving creativity and new ideas through projects and competitions.

highlights.heading: Community
highlights.text: Bringing together diverse students and fostering collaboration.

highlights.heading: Global Reach
highlights.text: Connected with IEEE worldwide to expand opportunities.

storyData.title: The Idea is Born
storyData.text: A group of passionate students came together with one vision: to establish IEEE MET SB.
storyData.details: With the beginning of the academic year, students spread the idea among friends and colleagues, encouraging them to join and gather memberships.

storyData.title: Facing Challenges
storyData.text: The first submission for approval was rejected, but the team didn’t give up.
storyData.details: Instead, they worked together, solved the issues, and prepared a stronger application for IEEE.

storyData.title: Official Approval
storyData.text: IEEE officially recognized MET Student Branch.
storyData.details: This milestone marked the true beginning of our journey, full of passion, teamwork, and ambition to build a vibrant community of engineers.

storyData.title: First Project: Awareness Bites
storyData.text: Our journey took its first big step with Awareness Bites, an online project of 6 sessions.
storyData.details: Each session included technical and soft-skills parts, delivered by MET graduates working abroad. The project attracted 500+ students from across Egypt.

storyData.title: Social Media Campaign: Know Your Cycle
storyData.text: We launched a creative social media campaign introducing branch cycles.
storyData.details: Produced 5 videos and a series of posts introducing Media, HR, Assistant, Business, and Logistics to help members understand the branch structure.

storyData.title: First Recruitment Drive
storyData.text: We officially opened doors for new members to join.
storyData.details: Recruitment took place over four days: 4 & 5 September 2024 (online interviews) and 9 & 10 September 2024 (offline interviews & activities). Candidates went through screening interviews and interactive tasks to prepare them for branch roles.

storyData.title: First Offline Project at Creativa
storyData.text: Our first offline project at Creativa Mansoura ran for a whole week.
storyData.details: Participants engaged in Project Management and Design Thinking sessions focused on self-development and enhancing branch growth. This marked a shift from online activities to professional offline training.

storyData.title: First Orientation Day
storyData.text: Our first Orientation Day at Creativa Mansoura.
storyData.details: An informative and fun day that introduced the branch to new members and strengthened community spirit. It helped members learn more about the branch and each other while breaking the ice.

storyData.title: First College Booth
storyData.text: Our first booth inside MET campus increased visibility of IEEE MET SB.
storyData.details: Members visited lectures and classrooms to introduce the branch, talk with students, and invite them to join IEEE MET SB.

storyData.title: Second Recruitment Drive
storyData.text: Recruitment designed as a Project Management experience.
storyData.details: A dedicated Project Manager led the process at Creativa Mansoura. New members joined through tasks and interviews, marking the beginning of structured leadership and scaling.

storyData.title: Project R&D
storyData.text: To prepare new members, we launched Project R&D at Creativa Mansoura.
storyData.details: This project was fully organized and delivered by IEEE MET members. Sessions focused on skills development, teamwork, and practical training — representing the shift from learning to leading.
